page.title: 11Children's games; Fauldhouse
page.content: The most popular game for boys is {football.}The offical football season is in{Autumn and Winter,}but boys play all year round for amusement. In the {spring and summer }they like to play {marbles}a marble is a small glass ball , you have to try and win your opponents marbles by knocking them out of the circle. You hold the marble on the first finger with the thumb bent underneath , you flick the marble forward by straightening your thumb .A street game called {kirby} is a game where you find two kirbs , you get a ball and you and your opponent stand on a kirb and try to hit the other kirb.
